ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards get a bow
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe it works as a stringed instrument.  ;^) Actually, that would be sweet, since it would mean we could duel weild weapons while playing. Peace Evulia, bard
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe it works as a stringed instrument. ;^)

Actually, that would be sweet, since it would mean we could duel weild
weapons while playing.

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 songs, Tunare
